text:
Cross post from <@U2DRLHLRF>  in diversity. Excellent charts on the dos and don'ts on designing for accessibility. It's a must-have for all product people.

<http://buff.ly/2dGBvTg> <https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Cv1nM9kW8AAx5Hm.jpg>

attachments.title: Dos and don'ts on designing for accessibility
attachments.text: Karwai Pun is an interaction designer currently working on Service Optimisation to make existing and new services better for our users. Karwai is part of an accessibility group at Home Office Digital
attachments.fallback: Dos and don'ts on designing for accessibility

text: !!! thx friend. found it hella late last night and was just like ‘ahhh where do i put this real good nugget’ :sparkles:
